title: Squaremile777
author: Squaremile777
content: If i have 5 mil EUR i get 5 mil EUR loan If you can help me i give you 2 mil EUR. Or we can discuss or you know someone who could help with this i have done all the prep we just need to add cherry on top of the cake the final 5mil transaction.The process IS about few weeks i have done all the preperations everything is discussed now i need just money Asap in order to get line of credit 5mil EUR ammount Im dealing with super wealth bank so it's serious deal and high stakes on the play The location is in Europe

comments.author: spectre71
comments.body: Can you 20 mil? That's as small as I can go. Wire me 10k first just  to mark the path.

comments.author: Squaremile777
comments.body: Quote from: spectre71 on August 22, 2023, 02:44:52 PMCan you 20 mil? That's as small as I can go. Wire me 10k first just  to mark the path.Stop joking Im looking serious i have prepared everything i didnt know that real money is required to secure loan.Now i have prepared all i need just money 5 mil Asap

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 22, 2023, 02:56:37 PMQuote from: spectre71 on August 22, 2023, 02:44:52 PMCan you 20 mil? That's as small as I can go. Wire me 10k first just  to mark the path.Stop joking Im looking serious i have prepared everything i didnt know that real money is required to secure loan.Now i have prepared all i need just money 5 mil Asap No one is joking here! If you want money, you have to show that you are serious.Are you willing to fork over 10k-20k to show you are a serious player? You will get 5 mil back ASAP!

comments.author: odunybiz
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 22, 2023, 01:41:15 PMIf i have 5 mil EUR i get 5 mil EUR loan If you can help me i give you 2 mil EUR. Or we can discuss or you know someone who could help with this i have done all the prep we just need to add cherry on top of the cake the final 5mil transaction.The process IS about few weeks i have done all the preperations everything is discussed now i need just money Asap in order to get line of credit 5mil EUR ammount Im dealing with super wealth bank so it's serious deal and high stakes on the play The location is in Europe I don't really understand what you were trying to say here. Is it that you want to take a loan through the forum. If so, it can't work because you are still a newbie in the forum and you need a more higher rank before such can be done.

comments.author: Squaremile777
comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on August 22, 2023, 09:41:09 PMQuote from: Squaremile777 on August 22, 2023, 02:56:37 PMQuote from: spectre71 on August 22, 2023, 02:44:52 PMCan you 20 mil? That's as small as I can go. If you want money, you have to show that you are serious.Are you willing to fork over 10k-20k to show you are a serious player? You will get 5 mil back ASAP!I Understood ur point but i dont have any that kind of money all my last money Will be used to travel to get in to location then get back to home then thre is up to 3weeks maximum waiting then i get line of credit i have everything ready and i can proof Im not greedy once i find person who help me on this i don't mind to share good money i cant do it my own this all anyways btw...this situation is good example that we all need others to make our plans everybody has their own things what we need and they need what you have.But yeah that's the situation ...things have gone too far now i must complete the process. Or i can make you who you helping me the co signer of loan contract or something to work out i don't know it just we can work out as long as u can help best If you have money in Europe or Western country bank otherwise the money can not be Accepted

comments.author: Litzki1990
comments.body: I read your post a few times and guessed that you might be thinking of taking a loan from the forum. There is system of taking loan in forum but it is small amount, you can never take loan from this forum as much as you mentioned. The amount of money loaned in the forum is based on your ID rank and the signature campaign you are involved in. You will be loaned with a certain amount of interest, in which case you are behind in all aspects. If you are a new member unlike you are not a member of any signature campaign you cannot borrow minimum amount from this forum. If you are in dire need of money, then you have to take a loan from the bank of the country in which you live, following certain procedures.

Well, if the OP has said something, it's better to respond and explain the situation as it is, if it's gray, I think the result will be nil and it can only be considered as a joke.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: You do know that you can never get something that you want if you don't have supporting stuff to prove right? What you did is just a bunch of text that doesn't mean anything to anyone and saying "serious" doesn't make it any serious.Stop wasting your time with stuff like this because it just makes you look like a desperate scammer.

comments.author: Davian144
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 22, 2023, 02:56:37 PMStop joking Im looking serious i have prepared everything i didnt know that real money is required to secure loan.Now i have prepared all i need just money 5 mil Asap Not everyone likes to joke when someone else asks seriously and if you ask in a serious tone, then you also have to take other people's answers seriously. Especially if what you are asking is about money that you need as soon as possible, but you also have to think that getting money is not easy even though you only need around 5 million EUR.If someone really wants to give you that much money, I think the giver will also want to know about what guarantees you can give and the giver will also ask what that much money is for, while you yourself are still a newbie and still not well known here. So my advice is to try contacting rich people outside this forum directly or even face to face and say that you need a loan for something more important. And you still have to hope So that they can believe you in that

But once i get confirmation i'll fly to bank and sign the loan contract.before i get to the bank i need to have 5mil EUR ready. So the person who will help me here with this must be reliable person everything must happend on time first little hard work and then all relax and celebrate

comments.author: khiholangkang
comments.body: It seems that you lack the trust of your environment, so you come to the forum to convey a collection of words with very funny "serious" sentences.I think that you are getting caught up in that person's marketing game, so you force yourself to find the minimum amount they offer.Does it look stupid?I say this is stupid, 5 million EUR is not a small amount of money, I'd rather keep it in bitcoins than enter into your plan.lol Show the proposal you mean to get the sympathy of fools.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 23, 2023, 12:02:56 PMSo the person who will help me here with this must be reliable person everything must happend on time first little hard work and then all relax and celebrateI think that here you can meet a lot of "reliable" guys who will help you get rid of your millions, and actually your problem as a result.

comments.author: DrBeer
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 22, 2023, 01:41:15 PMIf i have 5 mil EUR i get 5 mil EUR loan If you can help me i give you 2 mil EUR. Or we can discuss or you know someone who could help with this i have done all the prep we just need to add cherry on top of the cake the final 5mil transaction.The process IS about few weeks i have done all the preperations everything is discussed now i need just money Asap in order to get line of credit 5mil EUR ammount Im dealing with super wealth bank so it's serious deal and high stakes on the play The location is in Europe I will privately provide the IBAN code to transfer funds. There is a working business in the EU, good tax history, and other details of stability. I undertake, with all participants - to send a report on investments and the use of profits. Even with photos. I also undertake to send a letter of gratitude every year, and a souvenir PS if there is really "cheap money", write, I will tell you where to invest, in a working business, really bringing profit and good dividends

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 22, 2023, 01:41:15 PMIm dealing with super wealth bank so it's serious deal and high stakes on the play The location is in Europe Why looking for loan here when you can get it from those super banks and you do the business transaction with them. That will pay you more because they already know you better than users here who can't smell knowing you, so they will require a little collateral or none since they are going to hold the money and give you some percentage. I advise you to go offline for such and not to waste your time here.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 22, 2023, 02:56:37 PMStop joking Im looking serious i have prepared everything i didnt know that real money is required to secure loan.Now i have prepared all i need just money 5 mil Asap I actually think you're playing a joke here. Huh wanting to get a 5 million EURO loan here is impossible because no one will believe it, go to your nearest bank maybe they can help. I also see you made a thread on the lending board hopefully get a loan ASAP.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 23, 2023, 03:16:21 PMOk i got info now how it all works it's not like actually i was thinkig but there is still way to do so i need just right person for this.I am not sure you are getting my point. Having a 5 mil EUR to spare does not automatically make me want to throw it at random people on the internet. Nope, not how the world spins.Money represents value, and you have got to bring something valuable to the table to get something valuable in return. That is the foundation of a market economy. So, what can you bring to the table in terms of value?

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Well, I didn't care to check your profile  bjt I believe  you should  be having a red tag on your profile and I'm sorry to say but I think thisnis a big slap on the faces of people  here because I think this simply means the fellow is thinking  less of us and that's  absolutely  not right because you don't just come to a public space as such and think people will be so hunkered to jump on scamming deals as this  and the major reason for any tag would be a newbie asking for huge funds without collateral but I'm sure no will do that because no one, absolutely  no one will with to deal not even a singular dollar transaction because of your rank and here, ranks and years of experience and rank achieved is a major determinant of reputation over here and I don't think anyone will want to give out 5mil euro without a collateral, so I'm sorry and you should get a collateral and head  straight  to the lending board  and I'm sure people will be glad to offer.

comments.author: Bushdark
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 22, 2023, 02:56:37 PMQuote from: spectre71 on August 22, 2023, 02:44:52 PMCan you 20 mil? That's as small as I can go. Wire me 10k first just  to mark the path.Stop joking Im looking serious i have prepared everything i didnt know that real money is required to secure loan.Now i have prepared all i need just money 5 mil Asap Why don't you go get a loan since from your own perspective, you think your ideas is going to give a lot of money and it's going to be very successful. If you don't want to get a loan then you can sell your ideas to people that can utilize it and pay you a huge sum of money which can be more than what you are looking for to start your project. That kind of money is too big for anything you are thinking to achieve. I believe in starting small so that you can grow your ideas with time to gain funds to utilize it more.
